text: 3. Let X be a uniform random variable on [0, 1] and let Y be uniform on [~1,0]. Compute Cov(X, X?) and Cov(Y,Y?). (The first is positive and the second is negative, consistent with the fact that X? increases when X increases and X? decreases when X decreases, whereas the opposite is true for Â¥ and Y2.)
